üì¢ Information for farmers in the viticulture sector ‚ùó ‚û° The new vine register and the information system for its maintenance have been put into operation at the Executive Agency for Vine and Wine (EAVW). ‚û° In this regard, EAVW invites grape growers to visit the relevant office of the agency (central administration or territorial unit), where they will receive the necessary information and assistance for the delineation of the vineyard plots in the vineyards they manage. ‚û° IMPORTANT‚ùó‚ùó‚ùó All applicants for the admission, which started on 15.10.2023 under the intervention "Restructuring and conversion of vineyards" from the Strategic Plan, should have previously outlined the plots in their vineyard no later than 10.11.2023. üîó To the new vine register https://lnkd.in/dT5WV47G üîó To the information of EAVW https://lnkd.in/dHZUMkje Have a good read‚ùó Stay informed with GR BG BUSINESS PASSPORT‚ùó #grbgbusinesspassport #Project #InterregProject #InterregGreeceBulgaria #InterregCommunity #InfoCampaign #InformationCampaign #SMEnews #SMEsupport #SME #Business #News #Entrepreneurship #Agriculture #Farmers #Legislation #Greece #Bulgaria #Thessaloniki #Haskovo Interreg Greece - Bulgaria Program https://greece-bulgaria.eu GR BG BUSINESS PASSPORT web site https://lnkd.in/dNCmRXgb GR BG BUSINESS PASSPORT news https://lnkd.in/d6GR4Qxt _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ This information is brought to you on the Project GR BG BUSINESS PASSPORT, co-funded by the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) and by national funds of the countries participating in the Cooperation Programme Interreg V-A ‚ÄúGreece-Bulgaria 2014-2020‚Äù . The contents of this information are sole responsibility of RMA Maritza and can in no way be taken to reflect the views of the European Union, the participating countries the Managing Authority and the Joint Secretariat.

‚ú®New Article Alert‚ú® Unraveling the secrets behind premium quality! üå± Introducing our latest publication ‚Äî "Building a Database for the Quality Characteristics of PDO Saffron Krokos Kozanis, with a Focus on International Trade Requirements." Dive into the intricate world of #KrokosKozanis, Greece's treasured crimson gold, and discover how we're setting new standards in agricultural excellence. üå∏üåç üëâ To delve deeper, scan the QR code or click the link below for immediate access to read, download, and share this fascinating piece of research. https://lnkd.in/gvmsJAbC Let's explore together the meticulous efforts in preserving tradition while catering to global demands. Your insights are valuable‚Äîjoin the conversation and spread the knowledge! üåêüìö #PDOProducts #SaffronQuality #InternationalTrade #AgriculturalExcellence #ShareTheKnowledge

Our video of the recent Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) signing that took place on 10 November in Beijing at the Park Hyatt between Avocados Australia and the China Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Association is now available - https://lnkd.in/gFQ_ZRFB The MOU signing was a highlight of Avocados Australia's trip to China. The trip provided the opportunity to establish relationships and nurture existing ones with our key stakeholders in the region. Through the trip, we have learned that: 1) In China consumers are fast adopters of avocado and it is in use in mainstream cuisine, particularly fresh salads and healthy smoothies, 2) importers are installing avocado ripening facilities to meet growing consumer demand for ripe and ready, and 3) importers are very eager to access Aussie avos due to our annual supply capabilities and our close proximity to their market. ü•ëü•ëü•ë Avocados Australia Limited China Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Association (CIQA) Department of the Premier and Cabinet (Queensland) #DepartmentofAgriculturalIndustryDevelopmentandFisheries Trade and Investment Queensland Australian Trade and Investment Commission (Austrade) Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry #AustralianChamberofCommerceChina Queensland Fruit & Vegetable Growers Department of Primary Industries & Regional Development Hort Innovation
